-lsa.label: Party Average Level
-lsa.description: Enemy and boss levels equal to {{ . }}x party average level

-lsh.label: Party Highest Level
-lsh.description: Enemy and boss levels equal to {{ . }}x highest level in party

-lsce.label: Characters + Espers
-lsce.description: Enemies and bosses gain {{ . }} levels for each character recruited and esper acquired

-lsced.label: Characters + Espers + Dragons
-lsced.description: Enemies and bosses gain {{ . }} levels for each character recruited, esper acquired, and dragon defeated

-lsc.label: Checks
-lsc.description: Enemies and bosses gain {{ . }} levels for each check completed

-lst.label: Time
-lst.description: Enemies and bosses gain 1 level every {{ . }} minutes

-hma.label: Party Average Level
-hma.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales {{ . }}x party average level

-hmh.label: Party Highest Level
-hmh.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales {{ . }}x highest level in party
